description: Try our easy to follow Mixed Seafood Gumbo recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Soup,Low saturated fat,Seafood,Low sugar,Sesame free,High protein,High fibre,Wheat free,Rice,Tomato,Easter
name: Mixed Seafood Gumbo Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over high heat. Cook bacon, vegetables and seasoning for 3 minutes or until fragrant. Add flour and stir to coat.
Stir in 3 cups boiling water and tomatoes. Bring to the boil, then reduce heat to medium and simmer, uncovered, for 5 minutes.
Add rice, seafood marinara mix and beans. Simmer, uncovered, for 5-6 minutes or until seafood is just cooked. Season gumbo to taste, scatter over the coriander and serve.
